name: Age of Empires
description:
This script is a complement installer to "Age of Empires I" one,  it will help you to install "Rise of Rome" extension CD edition.
"Age of Empires I" should be installed before to launch this installer.
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Update ROR version to 1.0a version.
- Support multilanguage CD install: eng,fra,ger,ita,por,spa.
- You will need the CD only one time during install
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

input_menu.description: Please choose AOE I CD language (do not choose another language other than your CD's one)

content:
extends: age-of-empires
files:
- scriptinstall: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/findaoe.sh
- updt: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/aoe1_update_1.0c_multi.zip
- scriptclean: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/clean.sh
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/aoe1covers.zip
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    file: updt
- insert-disc:
    requires: aoex.ico
- chmodx: scriptinstall
- execute:
    args: $DISC
    file: scriptinstall
- task:
    args: /desktop=ROR,1024x780 $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/aoeinstall.bat
    description: Installing Rise of Rome extension...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    include_processes: explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
- input_menu:
    description: Please choose AOE I CD language (do not choose another language other
      than your CD's one)
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - ge: German
    - it: italian
    - sp: Spanish
    - po: Portuguese
    preselect: en
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 255 0 0
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/aoe1covers
    src: wpp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\aoe1.bmp
- chmodx: scriptclean
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG "$DISC" ror
    file: scriptclean
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
